name: AzureDevTestLabsDeleteCustomImage
friendlyName: Azure DevTest Labs Delete Custom Image
description: Delete an Azure DevTest Labs Custom Image
helpMarkDown: Deletes the specified custom image from the selected lab.
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Delete Azure DevTest Labs Custom Image
releaseNotes: Works with cross-platform agents (Linux, macOS, or Windows)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab
inputs.helpMarkDown: Lab from which the resource will be deleted. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a subscription. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Lab ID. The Lab ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.

inputs.name: CustomImageId
inputs.label: Custom Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom Image that will be deleted. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a lab. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Custom Image ID. The Custom Image ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}/customImages/{ciName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed. For example, you can use any variable such as `$(customImageId)`, which is the output of calling **Create Azure DevTest Labs Custom Image**.
